name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 7, the Guangdong Exit and Entry Administration issued an announcement that due to a system failure, entry and exit document processing services are temporarily unavailable. 
The system will be notified as soon as it is restored.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @ProLinc8 I think it’s good to have nothing to post

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
The staff establishment of all departments of the central government will be uniformly reduced by 5%

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
People's Daily published an article today criticizing "Ji Ni Tai Mei", which triggered ridicule from netizens
Accused of avoiding the main issue, not paying attention to the eight-hour work system, common areas and other fundamental issues of the masses, and only focusing on such dispensable things.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Qin Gang talked about "Wolf Warrior Diplomacy" at the press conference today: The so-called "Wolf Warrior Diplomacy" is a discourse trap. Those who create this discourse trap either do not understand China and Chinese diplomacy, or ignore the facts and have ulterior motives. More than 2,000 years ago, Confucius said: "Repay kindness with kindness, and repay grievances with justice; if you repay grievances with kindness, how can you repay kindness?" China's diplomacy has enough kindness and goodwill, but when the evil wolf invades, Chinese diplomats must "dance with the wolf to protect the country.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the official blog of People's Daily Online, people used their profile pictures to express their protest.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Today's discussion about "Ji Ni Tai Mei" made me feel a little emotional.
It was originally a popular Internet meme, which was born in January 2019 when Cai Xukun was appointed as the NBA's New Year ambassador.
We can regard this origin as a protest and disdain by the general public against the popular idols created by capital and traffic invading the fields they love. Of course, I also think that there is also an element of cyber violence in this. …

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@HuChenAn Cai Xukun's personal story is indeed a phenomenal textbook of an individual defeating a group of capital, but in the eyes of the general public, people don't care about his background story, because when people see him, he is already part of the capital and traffic support.
People's prejudice against talent show stars, and the capital that has begun to infiltrate various fields with talent show stars, are the root causes of this meme.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@bobo_flying This seems to be an unsolvable problem, because online violence against celebrities or online celebrities is part of the online culture. One of the functions of these people is to be dispelled by everyone, which is what celebrities have to endure.
If online violence against you eventually becomes a culture, then no matter what kind of abuse you endure, you can only smile bitterly and laugh at yourself, and then be praised by the public for being really optimistic and generous.

name: 李老师不是你老师
李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen added: Up to now, students from Xi'an International Studies University are still protesting the semi-closed state of the school online.
